projects.name: EzShop [2026]
projects.description: EZShop is a retail management system designed to handle the end-to-end operations of a small to medium-sized shop, integrating user management, inventory control, sales, orders, and accounting functions into a single platform. EZShop orchestrates comprehensive business operations, from inventory management to financial transactions.

projects.name: Maze Navigation Problem [2025]
projects.description: My thesis, 'Analysis of Optimal Navigation Strategies for Autonomous Exploration in Unknown Environments', researches autonomous navigation through strategies like Random Walk, Wall Follower, Tremaux, and Adaptive Walk. Simulations demonstrate that Adaptive Walk excels in efficiency and success, with critical applications in robotics and multi-agent systems.

projects.name: Brain Test Quiz Bot [2023]
projects.description: Brain Test Quiz Bot is a Telegram bot that challenges users' intelligence and cognitive skills through a variety of quizzes and puzzles. It covers grammar, logic, math, and general knowledge, offering three difficulty levels with timers: Easy (10s), Medium (7s), and Hard (5s), providing a fun and engaging learning experience.

projects.name: Database Cinema System [2023]
projects.description: Cinema Database System is designed to track cinema operations, including screening rooms, ticket and snack sales, staff shifts, and customer feedback. It ensures seat availability, manages sales transactions, updates snack pricing, and calculates daily revenue. The system also stores film details and aggregates anonymous reviews for informed movie selection.

projects.name: Hangman Game [2022]
projects.description: Hangman Game is a Python-based interactive word-guessing game. Users try to reveal a hidden word by selecting letters, with a limited number of lives. The program handles input validation, dynamically updates the word display, and selects random words from a list, offering an engaging command-line gaming experience.
